title: 'Yellowstone' Season 4 Premier With Bill Simmons, Ryen Russillo, and Chris Ryan
description:
The Ringer's Bill Simmons is joined by Chris Ryan and Ryen Russillo to discuss the two-part season four premiere of 'Yellowstone'.

Host: Bill Simmons
Guests: Ryen Russillo and Chris Ryan
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
